website_summaries.verdict: A good value on a set of paints with color that lasts, but is also easy to clean with soap and water.
pros: Less expensive in the kit than purchased alone
Easy to wash off with soap and water
Includes a guide on how to face paint
cons: This is a "mini" starter kit, which means it is not as big and doesn't have as many colors as others on the market

customer_reviews.title: A good starter kit
customer_reviews.text: I received a couple damaged pots of paints which is why I did not give this product a 5 star rating. The product was reasonably priced and that greatly influenced my decision to buy it. It contained all the basic colours I wanted and simple instructions for beginners. The paint is easily removed from the skin and doesn't stain my daughter's face. I bought this set to be able to paint my daughter's face and allow her to paint her own designs since she kept using any marker or pen to do so. It is a great starter kit.
customer_reviews.author: Nya

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Snazaroo paints are super easy to use, not likely to spill, and wash off easily. Do not let the size of the makeup fool you. It's a lot like watercolor paint, you get way more than it seems. I do suggest getting a small spray bottle filled with water to use with the paint. Spray the paint, swirl with brush, then paint away. This kit comes with everything else you need to get started.
customer_reviews.author: swissarmygirl

customer_reviews.title: I look like I have Jaundice now. Don't buy this stuff.  Zero stars if i could.
customer_reviews.text: The face paint is rock hard and had to warm it in the microwave it to even get it to spread on my face. Once I finally got the the paints applied they cracked and was flaking off with in an hour. Now the fun part. All the colors (black white & blue) washed of with simple water and my hands however the yellow stains like permanent ink. I've used Dawn, fingernail polish remover and Simple Green. Nothing works. I'm now walking around looking like i have Jaundice. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great starter face painting set!
customer_reviews.text: All the basic colors are there, and the circles are big. Snazaroo paints are not as fluid and smooth as Wolfe FX face paints, but they are acceptable and lots of people use them. Paints are affordable. This set comes with a set of brushes, sponges, the paints, instruction booklet with ideas, and nice handle-box. I have used this set many times. You can fit a mirror, apron, and medium-sized water containers in this box. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: kids and adults love it. the only problem i had were that some colors kept falling out of the pans, but they didn’t break so it’s fine
customer_reviews.author: kai

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: When I received the kit in the mail it was only partially hinged. When I opened it up it looked like everything was just thrown in the box. Even the bubble packaging that is supposed to protect the items was deflated. Very very poor packaging and cheap product for the price. I could have assembled a much nicer kit for much less of the cost. I feel ashamed to give this as a birthday gift but already bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for face painting at events
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent face painting kit. We used it at our charity event for our school. There were plenty of colors, and there was still plenty left over after the event. The paint was colorful and did not smear at all. We would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this set but my carrying case was smashed
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how to go about this. I love this set but my carrying case was smashed, the products for the most part were okay except one was cracked and another when i opened it the whole paint cake fell out and cracked on the floor. I am unsure if amazon with replacemy broken paint cake and broken case? I would have just returned it had i not needed it for a event asap
customer_reviews.author: Emi

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Saw someone on YouTube use this brand ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Saw someone on YouTube use this brand of paint and it works just as shown on the video. Colors are vibrant and easy to use. I got the kit bc I really wanted a nice tote for everything. Very happy with this product. I can tell it will go a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Heather O.

customer_reviews.title: the colors were great and went on easily
customer_reviews.text: the colors were great and went on easily. I was very pleased with the consistency of the paints and the coverage. Mixing the colors wasn't as good and some of the colors just couldn't be achieved ( red and yellow made a very lukewarm salmon....not so great for pumpkins). Not really a problem asd I bought a starter kit ad will just add colors as I go...price is so reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Debra L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the buy.
customer_reviews.text: Im so glad i purchased this, much cheaper than buying individually. The paint is very good quality, as are the brushes. Easily activated, very vibrant, well worth the money. The only con I've noticed is the green tends to turn a bit yellow-y after 4 or so hours, and the white tends to fade. Other than that, theyre really top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Jebelle87

customer_reviews.title: Fair Buy
customer_reviews.text: I Ordered this as I have started doing Face Painting at Kids Parties, It came with all the products in the description, but the Blue Paint was open, melted and made a little mess inside of said kit. Apart from that everything in fine, perfect for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Raejeane

customer_reviews.title: Happy! =)
customer_reviews.text: Came with everything described. No damages to either paints or container. One paint is a little loose in the pan but not a concern. Brushes seem okay, no fraying or loose ferrules. Good size container to expand on colours. Glitter gel is a nice touch! Face painting guide isn't necessary, but good for "inspiration". Would repurchase 100%!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great product.
customer_reviews.text: Used this for Fall Carnival. Went on very well. Cleaned up with ease.
customer_reviews.author: ArtdudeSouth

customer_reviews.title: Good Kit.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. This works well for face painting; and I'm concerned with the fairly low volume of glitter; but overall it's a solid kit for face painting. The instructions / guide is not all that helpful in terms of technique; I'd rely on youtube for better guidance as far as using sponges / brushes, and how much water to add to the paint in order to get decent paintability.
customer_reviews.author: Jen S

customer_reviews.title: Painting On Smiles..
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a church function on little kiddos, great opacity and high quality, the carrying box REALLY helped, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent texture variety and stays on like magic!
customer_reviews.text: Came without problems, worked like a charm. Snazaroo is a great company - the paint goes on with a wonderful finish and has a variety of textures depending on what instrument you use to put it on. The paint itself is long-lasting yet easy to get off of skin with soap and water.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi K-R

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect large starter kit. Had exactly what I needed to do a community activity and another kids party, and still plenty more for future events and fun. I trust the snazaroo brand to be hypoallergenic
customer_reviews.author: J. Earl

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality face paint product that's very affordable. I always trust this brand with my facepainting business.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Plassmann

customer_reviews.title: This was a HUGE hit at my daughter's graduation party ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a HUGE hit at my daughter's graduation party for the little one's... even some of the older kids too ;)
customer_reviews.author: MrsLawver

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best facepaint ever!! I wish this stuff was around when I was a kid
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. The paints are easy to use and clean up nicely. Shipping was much faster than stated. Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by a professional face painter!
customer_reviews.text: These were recommended to me by a professional face painter. Exactly what I wanted, but this is a HUGE box for what you actually get. Bigger than would ever be filled up even with additional paints.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product but Snazaroo has to work better in the package. Everything comes losen inside.
customer_reviews.author: D. Brenes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome face paint
customer_reviews.text: Had my daughters bday party it was nice. Lasted long time. Easy use. Clean no drip or sticky
customer_reviews.author: Yesika  morales

customer_reviews.title: Great value! If you like Snazaroo...
customer_reviews.text: This kit comes with a lot for a great price Seriously seperately these items would cost way more I use this case all the time, I love the brushes too my only wish is that Snazaroo would make sturdier face paint pots...the lids always crack easily and the paint portion often comes out and has to be re-glued
customer_reviews.author: Butch Flarida

customer_reviews.title: but that's an easy fix. All of the supplies though are great
customer_reviews.text: The box itself is a little disappointing, but that's an easy fix. All of the supplies though are great, and you can't beat the price to buy the pieces individually. Love Snazaroo paints! Nice color coverage, safe and FDA approved, easy clean-up and application.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for Price
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived perfectly. I created a lot of looks for events and they came out awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Paloma McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I had tried different paints with my ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I had tried different paints with my kids, and they would get hard or were really oily, but this particular kit is amazing. You can paint them really easily and the product stays on for a long time. I really recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: face painting
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! My daughter is a face painter and the kids' faces looked awesome after using this product. This is a great deal. Separately, theses paints cost $15.99 each in our local store.
customer_reviews.author: Susie L.

customer_reviews.title: I really recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I love it just wat I wanet works great on kids
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Missing two colors
customer_reviews.text: The kit was missing two colors! I didn't realize it until I opened it up to use one the day of my sons birthday party! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this kit! Great selection of colors and brushes and the box is a big winner.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Works great but is an expensive investment for a block party or if used sparingly
customer_reviews.author: Tunia

customer_reviews.title: Snazaroo!
customer_reviews.text: Great kit! Love the box container that comes with it because I can put my other paints, brushes and stuff in it for easy storage and mobility!
customer_reviews.author: micheller

customer_reviews.title: great fun
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit for anyone wanting to do face painting. Just beware of the colors offered in it. No red... for example.
customer_reviews.author: Green Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kit-great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome kit for face painting so much less messy and easier to use I love snazaroo and prefer these 18ml pots this is a great value as buying all this seperate would cost way more My only complaint was the company who sold it through Amazon did not package the contents inside the box well so two of the face paints got broken. Amazon's packaging was great but be ware if you buy it from someone and not directly from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This stuff holds up to sweat and wear. Definitely would only buy this brand from now on.
customer_reviews.author: mimi

customer_reviews.title: They are also easy to wash off and clean up
customer_reviews.text: I face paint for many large school and community fairs. These paints go a LONG way, last a long time, and are very effective. They are also easy to wash off and clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: For the price and the size of the box I ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price and the size of the box I thought it was a little lacking. I had to buy extra stuff to put in to make it look worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: Janet S.

customer_reviews.title: two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my kit. the paint is of a very nice quality and i got it for half the price the snazaroo website sells them for which was great . If your into fave painting its definitely a great investment !!!
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Love this kit for my kids
customer_reviews.text: Love this kit for my kids. Only issue I had was that the kit had to black paints and no blue. Must have just been a packing error on Snazaroo's part. Other then that my kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: SiREN

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set. the only problem is the white cakes and flakes off. :(
customer_reviews.author: Honey2800

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent on the paints. Not satisfied with the carry-kit which was poorly built. Satisfied with the manual.
customer_reviews.author: CAGEIN JOSEPH

customer_reviews.title: Great product and shipping
customer_reviews.text: Received this item at a timely manner and I am so loving it. Thanks so much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome and is enough to start painting faces. I am soo exited!
customer_reviews.author: Cacimarve111

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to blend and I have never had a complaint or allergic reaction using snazaroo
customer_reviews.author: Taj Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great for Beginners!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! Lots more room to store the more of your brushes and paints!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Like that it has a carrying case
customer_reviews.text: If using on girls faces, also purchase the pink color separately. Comes with silver glitter which adds a great touch to the face painting.
customer_reviews.author: JOSIE

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's more easy for first to use it. The book talk about how to used it. Kids like it.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: and she LOVED it!
customer_reviews.text: We received the face painting kit as described, within time frame specified, and she LOVED it!! Thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Central Iowa

customer_reviews.title: Everything else was perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.text: Box Came Cracked on 2 corners, Everything else was perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Yacary Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome start up kit. It includes everything to start you on your way to the world of facepainting
customer_reviews.author: Lashonda Norman

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This is THE best starter kit for beginners... I bought this to try out on my daughter for Halloween. Worked great! Stayed on very well and easy to remove. Instructions are done very well! Can't say enough good about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Meland Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit,as a beginner to face painting it had ever thing I needed. great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Trina Carr

customer_reviews.title: All in all ok. Box was missing clasp when ...
customer_reviews.text: All in all ok. Box was missing clasp when it came so I couldn't close it and carry it.
customer_reviews.author: Imeri

customer_reviews.title: received box promptly
customer_reviews.text: was very prompt delivery. good color selection. but i needed to get more colors pink purple and orange alos could use more sponges
customer_reviews.author: Julie Freeman

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Great starter set. It has nice sized colors, sturdy container to keep them in and the instruction booklet and brushes are a bonus. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cmfar197778

customer_reviews.title: face painting fun
customer_reviews.text: Definitely good value! I checked Snazaroo's official website and their kits there are much more expensive. Paint is very of very good quality. I wish it had few more brushes, 5 at least, it had 3 in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Amira

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This kit came on time with nothing wrong with it! size #1,2 & 3 brushes; 2 round sponges; 6-18ML colors (lids not cracked) red,yellow,green,blue,black & white.and the lil' book
customer_reviews.author: Robert Davis

customer_reviews.title: We're talking awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. Non-toxic, hypo-allergenic, goes on evenly, great color, comes off easily, and lasts forever. You don't even need a lot of it to fully cover a face. Everything I wanted in facepaint came true with this product, and I will buy Snazaroo facepaint from now on.
customer_reviews.author: racine Balough

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Makeup
customer_reviews.text: This is a Great Product I;m Wearing The Stuff Right Now and it feels good Please Buy This Product It's a good toy Buy it for your kids It's fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.author: TheRealityofBE

customer_reviews.title: but disappointed when I opened it
customer_reviews.text: Excited to receive my new starter kit, but disappointed when I opened it. All the face paint was broken - a HUGE mess. Hoping Amazon will ship out some new face paint as a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Y

customer_reviews.title: Missing Paint and Glitter
customer_reviews.text: The kit is cute and the size of the paints are great but I was missing the red and green paint and the glitter. I had to return the whole thing and reorder it to try and get the full package this time. Sad that I can't start painting right away. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The lids were all broken
customer_reviews.text: The lids came all broken. Although I still didn't use the paintings but it seems to me it has poor quality as all the lids were broken. I will need to figure out what to do to cover the paintings before I begin to use it or it will be a mass.
customer_reviews.author: V.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE!  Great paint
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked Snazaroo. it was the first paint i bought when i began being a professional face painter. this kit is great. if you were to buy each color separately they sell usually for around $9. this kit should easily cost over $60. I recommend this kit. However, im very disappointed in the seller. it took over a MONTH to finally get this delivered to me. I think it came from the Czech Republic. i need to find out who i bought it from and never use them again
customer_reviews.author: AnnShamrock

customer_reviews.title: Good, inexpensive beginners resource
customer_reviews.text: This was one of my first beginners sets of face painting resources. I’ve added lots of paints and stencils to it since then.
customer_reviews.author: Dan R

customer_reviews.title: I Can Paint Faces!
customer_reviews.text: The box is sturdy and has a nice carrying handle. The space inside is plentiful. The sponges wash well and are reusable, I cut one in half and will likely cut the second into quarters. The glitter is a liquid/gooey texture to be painted on, it is not shaking glitter in case you are wondering. The instruction book is helpful. I like the quality of the paint, the colors are vibrant, the basic colors are included that are necessary for color mixing, Just add water!
customer_reviews.author: rory

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY KIDS
customer_reviews.text: MY BOX OF PAINTS AND BRUSH'S WAS IN GREAT SHAPE AND THE PAINTS WERE FINE. I USED THESE WITH OTHERS I BOUGHT AND MADE A WHOLE LOT OF KIDS VERY HAPPY. THE BOOK WITH SOME IDEAS WAS JUST GREAT. I AM VERY HAPPY WITH THIS PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: ANNABELLA

customer_reviews.title: TOO SMALL
customer_reviews.text: This would be a great item if it was not for the size of the case/box. I felt like I bought an item for a toddler and not my growing party business. I will be going to a department store and replacing it with a tool box! Otherwise I love Snazaroo products and I'm happy with the products in the box even though I feel that I did not get much product for the total cost.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Carrying case was not to the expected standard
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening, its was noticed that the box it came in did not have two end pieces to secure it closed
customer_reviews.author: Malika Lovelace

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little pack
customer_reviews.text: It is all you need to do any type of face painting to your kids and kids' friends. The only other color I wish it would have is brown, but ordered it separately. My son is 3 and every time he saw a face painting booth anywhere, I asked for it. but sometimes they would charge $10 for it (I never said yes!). Now, I can make him one anytime he asks.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent
customer_reviews.text: Snazaroo is worth every penny when face painting a large group of kids. It works well with real artists brushes and washes off the kids with out staining. I highly recommend them
customer_reviews.author: K.C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great products, as described. A+, fast shipping! Box is bigger than anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great but yellow did stain her face a little.
customer_reviews.text: These face paints are great! Other products would not come off and stain her face for days. This paints does not stain, except for the yellow but it's not that bad. Still way better then others we have used. It's super easy to use. Just add water to your brush and start.
customer_reviews.author: jpark932

customer_reviews.title: Happy as can be with this kit
customer_reviews.text: Happy as can be with this kit. So many ideas and face designs that I can make with this kit alone. I mostly bought this for my kids birthday parties but maybe I'll start to do other events.
customer_reviews.author: MarErika

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money! This product is awful! The paint is incredibly dry and does not go on smoothly.You have to use many layers of this dry junk to get it to cover. No wonder why it's so cheap. I made the mistake of not doing a test run with the paint ahead of time. I trusted the reviews that it was good, and my event was totally ruined. Maybe I got a bad batch, I don't know, but I will never buy this product again. :(
customer_reviews.author: Sandie

customer_reviews.title: I like that it is easy to use and easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is easy to use and easy to clean up after. Also it does not take much of the paint to paint a face.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit
customer_reviews.text: Started doing full faces as part of my volunteer work and this was a great starter set. The case holds all the extras that I have since purchased to add to the kit A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Donuts

customer_reviews.title: This kit was awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy using this kit! It is very functional and the product was of high quality. It would be great to get a coupon for the secondary colors that you will find that you will need. A secondary kit like this would be great as well!
customer_reviews.author: LevetteShakti

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent kit for parties if u have a talented child buy this kit and add to it for parties
customer_reviews.author: Joel R

customer_reviews.title: The paint quality is great. I would like to purchase more colors
customer_reviews.text: I didnt receive my gel glitter or brushes. The paint quality is great. I would like to purchase more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrica Wise

customer_reviews.title: The paints are a great quality and the case is a great bonus
customer_reviews.text: Came with everything the description says. The paints are a great quality and the case is a great bonus
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: A paint start but...
customer_reviews.text: Paint ok, techniques very basic, storage unit very cheap had to replace within weeks :(
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Owings

customer_reviews.title: Great Value.
customer_reviews.text: Easy way to organize face paint products and to keep clean. Loved it so much my friend bought this kit for her daughter to volunteer at children's charity events with me. Well worth the value. If each item were purchased separately it would be more costly.
customer_reviews.author: Rayej

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Better shipping packaging needed
customer_reviews.text: This very nice starter kit just arrived today and I am very pleased. The packaging could have been better because the large bubble protection was all deflated which left a lot of room for the plastic bin (which is very sturdy) to bounce around inside the box and the products inside the bin to be shaken up quite a bit. Two of the lids were off the paint containers but the paint was not damaged nor were the lids damaged or cracked. I guess I was lucky & won't have to be troubled with an exchange. Can't wait to build up the kit with more variety of paints.
customer_reviews.author: johut

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what is expected.
customer_reviews.text: It got here way sooner than posted. Made me very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Good product needs more stuff in it
customer_reviews.text: Like the kit you'll have to buy more sponges and brushes went to craft and got more paint
customer_reviews.author: patti

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great kit! We're having a blast with it at home!
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Great examples. Convenient storage box. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: c indy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this paint, it allowed me to do awesome face painting designs on all my little clients
customer_reviews.author: Alimelech Velez

customer_reviews.title: All good but one
customer_reviews.text: I am only giving this 4 stars because the lid of the green paint came all cracked and broken. But other then that I can't wait to use this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It last even after painting many kids. Great deal for the price I paid. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Waleska

customer_reviews.title: I am an amateur with no drawing or painting skills ...
customer_reviews.text: I am an amateur with no drawing or painting skills, but this kit made everyone think I was a pro. Will buy additional products from snazaroo! !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Face paint
customer_reviews.text: This face paint kit included all that was stated and worked great for my purposes. I have been pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Lanette Smith

customer_reviews.title: This is a great beginner face painting kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great beginner face painting kit. Even as a beginner I was able to use this kit with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Daquan Young

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: cannot believe i didn't buy more of these, awsome deal, shouldve snagged more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Face Paint
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a church function. We had lots of fun with it. Everyone enjoyed themselves. Easy to use. Wish I had order someother colors.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal, Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: This paint set was a great deal. It came fast and had a lot of the stuff we needed. The paints were fantastic colors. Very vivid. Comes with sponges, you add a drop of water and you can make the paint as thick or thin as you'd like. These can be rather costly individually. This set allowed us to get a lot of product for a great price. We order additional stencils and had a great time face painting for the Fourth of July. The paints lasted and wiped off easily with a washcloth.
customer_reviews.author: Amber M.

customer_reviews.title: To much money for such a Mickey Mouse product. ...
customer_reviews.text: To much money for such a Mickey Mouse product. The case is a flimsy plastic and had to be replaced upon arrival as it was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Bunnie A.

product_meta.title: Snazaroo Mini Starter Kit Face and Body Paint, 300, Multicolor
product_meta.description: SNAZAROO offers the World's Safest and Easiest to use Face Paints. The products are water-based, dry to the touch in one minute and wash off easily with mild soap and water.
feature_bullets: Easy to Use – A face painting guide that includes designs that can be achieved in 3 easy steps is included.

Made in the UK – All Snazaroo face paint is manufactured in the UK using only approved ingredients fully compliant with the US Food and Drug Administration (FDA) and toy and cosmetic regulations, and are non-toxic!

Suitable For Sensitive Skin – Snazaroo face paints are specially formulated to be friendly to the most delicate skin and are fragrance free. All Snazaroo face paints have been reviewed by an independent professor of dermatology and professional toxicologists.

Washable – Snazaroo face paints are all water based! This makes them as easy to get off as they are to put on. Simply remove with soap and warm water; there is no need for scrubbing or harsh removers.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
